body_html:
Commenting out that line gives the same error for me (Ubuntu 18.04, CUDA 10 and Python 3), but now at an earlier stage, see last lines of log:

[ 66%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir//aten/src/ATen/CUDALongType.cpp.o
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/build.make:197123: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir//aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/AffineGridGenerator.cpp.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/AffineGridGenerator.cpp.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:5236: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-mkldnn --use-qnnpack caffe2'

body:
Commenting out that line gives the same error for me (Ubuntu 18.04, CUDA 10 and Python 3), but now at an earlier stage, see last lines of log:

 [ 66%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/CUDALongType.cpp.o
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/build.make:197123: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/native/cudnn/AffineGridGenerator.cpp.o' failed

make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....

make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed

Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-mkldnn --use-qnnpack caffe2'
